mng: to walk, to go, to run, to move (of vehicle), to visit, to leave, to go away, to die (euph.), from, through, away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3]), to change (shape, form, meaning)

exm.mng: to walk past, to pass by
direction, strike (i.e. angle of inclination in geology), inclination, trend, to move towards, to head for
to move away from, to walk away from
(a product) sells well, to be in demand
to escape, to flee, to run away
corridor, aisle, hallway, colonnade, passageway, piazza, veranda
